title: Event Settings
description: Configure your event details, visibility, distances, and registration settings.

wizard.title: Finish setting up your event
wizard.description: Add your first distance, then publish when you are ready to share.

steps.distance: Add at least one distance with pricing.
steps.publish: Publish the event to make it visible.

visibility.title: Event Visibility
visibility.description: Control who can see and access your event. Published events appear in the public directory.

errors.missingDistances: Add at least one distance before publishing.
errors.missingPrices: Add at least one price for every distance before publishing.
errors.generic: Unable to update visibility. Please try again.

registration.title: Registration Status
registration.description: Pause or resume registration for this event. Paused events won't accept new registrations.

heroImage.title: Hero image
heroImage.description: Show a wide image on your event page and directory card.

errors.invalidType: Please upload a JPG, PNG, WebP, or GIF.
errors.saveFailed: Could not save the hero image.

capacity.title: Capacity settings
capacity.description: Choose whether capacity is per distance or shared across the event.
capacity.toggleHelp: When enabled, all distances pull from one shared pool.
capacity.sharedCapacityHelp: Total registrants allowed across all distances.

errors.required: Enter a total capacity to enable shared pool mode.

descriptionField.label: Event description
descriptionField.help: Give participants a clear overview of the event.

distances.title: Distances
distances.empty: No distances added yet. Add your first distance to enable registration.
distances.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this distance? This action cannot be undone.
